full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI GE DRUG GI 'KHOR LO'I KHUNGS DANG BSKOR TSUL GYI GNAD DMIGS PA BYA TSUL PHAN YON DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES YI GE DRUG GI 'KHOR LO'I KHUNGS DANG BSKOR TSUL GYI GNAD DMIGS PA BYA TSUL PHAN YON BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG @009B DGOS ZHES SKU 'BUM KHRI ZUR CHE SHOS SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DANG, SMAN PA BLA ZUR BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO GNYIS NAS BSKUL MDZAD NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' 'DAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG LUS CAN KUN LA PHAN BDE DPAG TU MED PA 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, NGAG GI DBANG PHYUG BRTAN PA'I 'KHOR LO YI, RMAD 'BYUNG MKHYEN RAB 'DZAM BU'I BIKshA'I 'BRAS, ZAB BRLABS BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I MA DROS MTSOR, YONGS SMIN NYI MA'I GNYEN GYI GDUNG 'TSOB DU, NGO MTSAR BSNGAGS PA'I GRAGS SNYAN DBYAR RNGA 'BUM, SKAL LDAN RMA BYA'I SNYING LA DPAL STER PA'I, CHE SHOS MKHAN CHEN ZHES GRAGS DPAG BSAM DBANG, GZHAN PHAN THUGS BSKYED SNYE MA GA-YUR DU ZA, GSANG GSUM MDZAD PA'I 'DAB MA PHYOGS BRGYAR GA-YO, 'PHRIN LAS BZANG PO'I GRIB BSIL KYON YANGS POS, 'GRO KUN SRID ZHI'I RGUD PA'I TSA GDUNG LAS, YONGS SU SKYOB PHYIR DUS KUN YOL MED 'BREL, ,DE'I PHYIR DPER GYI MI ZAD CHOS SBYIN 'DI, CHOS 'DI CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS @010A *, ,GLING DU, BSGRUB PAR MDZAD PA'I DGE TSOGS 'O MA'I CHAB, KUN BZANG SPYOD PA'I RGYA MTSOR YONGS SIM NAS, RGYAL BA'I LUGS BZANG DBYAR GYI MTSO LTAR RGYAS, DE 'DZIN DAM PA'I SKU TSE BSKAL BRGYAR BRTAN, DGE 'DUN SDE RNAMS BSHAD SGRUB 'KHOR LO 'PHEL, ,'GRO RNAMS RDZOGS LDAN DPAL LA ROL GYUR CIG , ,,YANGS PA'I RGYAL KHAMS KUN DU MI MTHUN PA'I, ,NYER 'TSE DUS KYI RGUD PA DRUNG PHYUNG NAS, PHUN TSOGS SDE BZHI DPAL 'BYOR RAB RGYAS SHING, BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN DPAL GYIS KHYAB GYUR CIG , ,,)
